_header: Thus in a piece of tire I most delite
_description: Charles d’Orléans, on his chosen mistress — two 5-line (aabba) and two 3-line (aaa) stanzas

BLHar682.First Lines:
THus in a pece of tyre y most deliteffor all therin y sett myn
                    appetit…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…So chese ye alle for þis haue chosen yNer cast noon
                    othir chese I yow bihite
